description.value: At 2nd level, the cavalier gains @Compendium[pf1.feats.lpXdFoT6OqS5vi2X]{Improved Sunder} as a bonus feat. In addition, when dealing damage to objects (including when using the sunder combat maneuver), he adds half his cavalier level to the damage roll. If an order of the beast cavalier successfully breaks an object, he receives a +2 morale bonus on all attack rolls until the end of his next turn.
